revised_title: A Large Human Calculus and Its Impact on Pain
tldr: This article discusses a large calculus (stone) found in a human bladder and its impact on pain. The author shares the history of the stone, its weight, and how it was removed. The article also highlights the importance of adjusting the position of the stone in the bladder to relieve pain, either through the use of a catheter or by altering the patient's posture.
